item.title: Web Controlled Arduino LED
item.description: As part of my initial experiments with the Arduino, I’ve been playing around with the Johnny-Five library. One of these led to building a homegrown room-temperature sensor + GraphQL project about which I wrote in my workplace blog. Another low-hanging fruit is a setup to control Arduino LEDs from the browser, through a HTML page with buttons. That is what this post is about. I’ll split this post into three parts:
